item0.name: Mercury's Treads
item0.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item1.name: Goredrinker
item1.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Sterak's Gage
item3.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item4.name: Long Sword
item4.description: 10 Attack Damage

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Plated Steelcaps
item0.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item2.name: Broken Stopwatch

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item4.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
item4.description:
20 Ability Haste
45 Move Speed
  • Gain 12 Summoner Spell Haste.

    ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.'

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Dark Harvest
perk0.shortDesc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
perk0.longDesc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 5.

Dark Harvest damage: 20-60 (based on level) (+5 damage per soul) (+0.25 bonus AD) (+0.15 AP)
Cooldown: 45s (resets to 1.5s on takedown)

item0.name: Stridebreaker
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
300 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

perk0.name: Press the Attack
perk0.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
perk0.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 180 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by 8 - 12% from all sources for 6s.

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item2.name: Broken Stopwatch
item2.description:
• Shattered Time: Stopwatch is broken, but can still be upgraded.

    After breaking one Stopwatch, the shopkeeper will only sell you Broken Stopwatches.

item3.name: Spirit Visage
item3.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item4.name: Mercury's Treads
item4.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Spectre's Cowl
item0.description:
250 Health
25 Magic Resist
  • Incorporeal: After taking damage from a champion, gain 150% base Health Regen for up to 10 seconds (duration increases with damage taken).

item1.name: Plated Steelcaps
item1.description:
20 Armor
45 Move Speed
  • Reduces incoming damage from Attacks by 12%.

item2.name: Control Ward
item2.description:
Active - Consume: Places a powerful Control Ward that grants vision of the surrounding area. This device will also reveal Invisible traps, reveal Camouflaged enemies, and reveal (and disable) enemy Stealth Wards.

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item3.name: Goredrinker
item3.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item4.name: Sterak's Gage
item4.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

60 Magic Resist
15 Ability Haste

Active - Unbreakable: Gain a (100 + 100% bonus Health) Shield that decays and grow 25% in size for 2.5 seconds. (90s cooldown).
  • Fortify: Taking damage from a champion grants a stack of 5% bonus Armor and 5% bonus Magic Resist for 6 seconds.

    Max 5 stacks; 1 per champion.

45 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
300 Health
20 Ability Haste

Active - Halting Slash: Lunge a short distance and deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies, Slowing them by 60%, decaying over 2 seconds (20s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Heroic Gait: Dealing physical damage grants 30 Move Speed for 2 seconds.

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed.

    Halting Slash's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item4.name: Control Ward

item5.name: Executioner's Calling

15 Attack Damage
  • Rend: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to champions for 3 seconds.

item0.name: Hailblade
item0.description:
10% Omnivamp vs. Monsters
  • Sear: Damaging Monsters burns them for (60 + 30% Ability Power + 5% bonus Attack Damage + 2% bonus Health) magic damage over 5 seconds.
  • Chilling Path: Smiting 5 times consumes this item upgrade your Smite to Chilling Smite. When smiting champions Chilling Smite deals 20 - 156 (based on level) true damage and steals 20% of their Move Speed for 2 seconds.
  • Huntsman: Killing Large Monsters grants bonus experience.
  • Recoup: Regen up to 8 - 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the Jungle or River.

    Consuming this item grants all item effects permanently. If you have gained more gold from minions than jungle monsters, gold and experience from minions is heavily reduced. Healing is not reduced on AoE attacks.

item1.name: Refillable Potion
item1.description: Active - Consume: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

item6.name: Stealth Ward
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Place a Stealth Ward on the ground that lasts between 90 - 120 seconds, is Invisible to enemies but grants your team vision of the surrounding area. Stores up to 2 Stealth Wards, generating a new Ward every 240 - 120 seconds.

  • Thorns: When struck by an Attack, deal (3 + 10% bonus Armor) magic damage to the attacker and apply 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds if they are a champion.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

perk0.name: Conqueror
perk0.shortDesc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
perk0.longDesc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 9% of the damage you deal to champions (6% for ranged champions).

item0.name: Goredrinker
item0.description:
45 Attack Damage
400 Health
20 Ability Haste
150% Base Health Regen

Active - Thirsting Slash: Deal (100% Attack Damage) physical damage to nearby enemies. Restore (25% Attack Damage + 8% missing Health) for each champion hit (15s cooldown, reduced by Ability Haste).
  • Spite: Gain 1% Attack Damage for each 5% missing Health (max 15%).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Haste.

item1.name: Winged Moonplate
item1.description:
150 Health
  • Flight: Grants 5% Move Speed.

item2.name: Spirit Visage
item2.description:
450 Health
40 Magic Resist
10 Ability Haste
100% Base Health Regen
  • Boundless Vitality: Increases all Healing and Shielding effectiveness on you by 25%.

item3.name: Mercury's Treads
item3.description:
25 Magic Resist
45 Move Speed
30% Tenacity

Tenacity reduces the duration of Stun, Slow, Taunt, Fear, Silence, Blind, Polymorph and Immobilizing effects. It has no effect on Airborne or Suppression.

item4.name: Sterak's Gage
item4.description:
50 Attack Damage
400 Health
  • Bloodlust: Dealing damage to or taking damage from a champion grants a stack, restoring (2% max Health | 1.2% max Health for Ranged champions) over 6 seconds.
  • Lifeline: Upon taking damage that would reduce your Health below 30%, gain a 200 Shield (increased by (8% max Health | 4.8% max Health for Ranged champions) per stack of Bloodlust) for 4 seconds (60s cooldown).

    Bloodlust stacks up to 5 times; 1 per champion. Healing and bonus shielding reduced to 60% for Ranged users.

Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 6s, gaining 2-5 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.
